completeListOfAbilities.name: Pyroclasm
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit 火 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
Becomes Pyroclasm+ for only next turn after using Red Spiral、 Red Spiral+、 White Whorl、 or White Whorl+

completeListOfAbilities.name: Red Spiral
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Increases BRV by 25% of HP damage dealt
Self: 7 turns ATK Up II
Triggers Whiteout (5-hit 氷 magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases BRV by 25% of HP damage dealt) from second use
Becomes Red Spiral+、 Whiteout becomes Whiteout+ after fifth use

Becomes Red Spiral+、 Whiteout becomes Whiteout+ after fifth use

passives.desc: BRV Attack becomes Critical if BRV at least INT BRV and target's BRV at least own BRV × 2\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack

passives.name: Buffed Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Break Bonus Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises Break Bonus upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Break Bonus Up: Raises Break Bonus

passives.name: Skybound
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn when BRV drops to 0 or below
passives.short_desc: Skybound: Raises SPD

passives.name: High Speed Buff
passives.desc: Largely raises SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: High Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.name: Red Spiral Extension
passives.desc:
Red Spiral use +2

Red Spiral triggers Whiteout from second use

When using Red Spiral、 Whiteout:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases BRV by 25% of HP damage dealt

When using Red Spiral:
 • Slight ATK Up boost、 duration +4

After using Red Spiral 5 times:
 • Red Spiral becomes Red Spiral+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt)
 • Whiteout becomes Whiteout+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt; self: 16 turns Flight to Freedom)
passives.short_desc: Red Spiral Extension: Boost to Red Spiral

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: White Whorl Extension
passives.desc:
White Whorl use +2

White Whorl triggers Luminescence from second use

When using White Whorl、 Luminescence:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using White Whorl:
 • Increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II

After using White Whorl 5 times:
 • White Whorl becomes White Whorl+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; increases BRV by 100% of HP damage dealt)
 • Luminescence becomes Luminescence+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; self: 16 turns Flight to Freedom)

With active buff:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)

While Flight to Freedom active:
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost from BRV Attack+; turn rate+)
passives.short_desc: White Whorl Extension: Boost to White Whorl

passives.name: Shatter Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: BRV Up Attack Up Extension
passives.desc: When using BRV Up Attack Up:\n • Slight raised ATK boost
passives.short_desc: BRV Up Attack Up Extension: Boost to BRV Up Attack Up

passive.name: BRV Up Attack Up Growth
passive.short_desc: BRV Up Attack Up Growth: Boost to BRV Up Attack Up

passive.name: Full HP Attack
passive.desc: Raises ATK by 10% while HP is MAX

passive.name: Greater Red Spiral
passive.desc: When using Red Spiral、 Red Spiral+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • ATK Up duration+
passive.short_desc: Greater Red Spiral: Boost to Red Spiral

passive.name: Sky Pirate's Heart
passive.desc:
When using White Whorl、 White Whorl+:
 • BRV damage boost
 • DEF Down boost、 hit rate+、 duration+

When using Luminescence、 Luminescence+:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Blind hit rate+
passive.short_desc: Sky Pirate's Heart: Boost to White Whorl

passives.short_desc: Mighty Pyroclasm: Increases BRV damage dealt with Pyroclasm

passives.short_desc: Pyroclasm Recast Up: Raises recast speed for Pyroclasm

passive.short_desc: Dark Sky Pirate's Power: Increases BRV damage dealt with Red Spiral、 Whiteout、 White Whorl、 Luminescence

passive.name: Blazing Wave Extension
passive.short_desc: Blazing Wave Extension: Boost to Pyroclasm

passives.name: Pyroclasm Advance+
passives.desc:
Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Pyroclasm、 Pyroclasm+、 Pyroclasm++

While equipping EX+ weapon Demonsbane (XII)+ or passive ability Blazing Wave Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Pyroclasm Advance+: Boost to Pyroclasm; enables HP Attack+

passives.name: Blazing Wave Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Demonsbane (XII)+ or passive ability Blazing Wave Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Blazing Wave Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Pyroclasm Buff Plus Starting
passives.desc:
When using Pyroclasm、 Pyroclasm+、 Pyroclasm++:
 • Self: 8 turns Flight to Freedom

8 turns Flight to Freedom at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Pyroclasm Buff Plus Starting: Boost to Pyroclasm; Flight to Freedom at start of quest

passives.name: Pyroclasm BRV Hit Plus Up Force++
passives.desc:
When using Pyroclasm、 Pyroclasm+、 Pyroclasm++:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target after HP attack

While Flight to Freedom active:
 • Pyroclasm、 Pyroclasm+ become Pyroclasm++ (large BRV damage boost over Pyroclasm+)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV; higher turn rate)
passives.short_desc: Pyroclasm BRV Hit Plus Up Force++: Boost to Pyroclasm
